name: Micro Glossary Dataset - SEBI NRI Re-KYC Geo-Tagging Circular
description: Micro glossary of key terms from SEBI’s NRI Re-KYC geo-tagging relaxation circular, with English terms, Hindi meanings, and Hinglish explainers.

isPartOf.name: RegDEEP™ - Regulatory Decoding & Explanation for Exam Purpose™
SEBI NRI Re-KYC Geo-Tag: RegDEEP Exam+Industry FREE PDF
isPartOf.description: FREE PDF: RegDEEP™ Quick Exam Revision & Industry Note - SEBI Circular (Dec 10, 2025): Relaxation on Geo-tagging for NRIs during Re-KYC. A Compact 2-in-1 RegDEEP guide Exam decoding + Industry actions for the latest SEBI update. Designed for NISM aspirants, MF distributors, RIAs, brokers, banks, fintechs, and all intermediaries using KYC/Re-KYC. Section 1: NISM Exam Aspirants- Snapshot summary, Exam essentials & high-yield points, Remember this distinctions, Likely MCQ triggers, and Clause → NISM Series mapping. Section 2: Industry Note All Intermediaries: Snapshot & operational meaning, Immediate action items, Implementation mapping table, Tech-Product checklist, Compliance notes, and Escalation matrix guidance.

isPartOf.headline: SEBI's Dec 2025 CIrcular Eases On NRI Re-KYC Geo-Tag Explained: NISM Exam & Industry Notes  -  RegDEEP™ Decoding | FAQs | Glossary | FREE PDF Micro Summary
isPartOf.description: An exam-focused and industry-oriented analysis of SEBI's Dec 10, 2025 circular easing geo-tagging requirements for NRIs during re-KYC; includes clause breakdown, NISM exam relevance, operational notes and sample MCQs.

isBasedOn.name: SEBI Circular - Relaxation on Geo-Tagging Requirement in India for NRIs while undertaking re-KYC (Dec 2025)

publisher.name: Securities and Exchange Board of India

usageInfo: This structured data entry represents an educational summary and regulatory decoding under RegDEEP. It is not an official SEBI circular. Refer to the regulator’s website for authoritative information.

hasPart.name: RegdeepMicroGlossary JSON Schema
hasPart.text: {"$schema":"https://json-schema.org/draft/2020-12/schema","title":"RegdeepMicroGlossary","description":"Dataset schema for the micro glossary of key terms from SEBI NRI Re-KYC Geo-Tagging circular, with English, Hindi, and Hinglish (hi-Latn) fields and an identifier.","type":"object","properties":{"micro_glossary":{"type":"array","description":"Micro glossary terms from SEBI NRI Re-KYC Geo-Tagging circular in English (en-IN), Hindi (hi-IN), and Hinglish (hi-Latn).","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"type":"integer","description":"Unique row identifier."},"identifier":{"type":"string","description":"Stable identifier for the glossary term (e.g., regdeep_nri_rekyc_mg_001)."},"term_en":{"type":"string","description":"Term and meaning in English (language: en-IN)."},"term_hi":{"type":"string","description":"Hindi meaning of the term (language: hi-IN)."},"term_hiLatn":{"type":"string","description":"Hinglish explainer using Latin script for Hindi (language: hi-Latn)."}},"required":["id","identifier","term_en","term_hi","term_hiLatn"]}}},"required":["micro_glossary"],"examples":[{"micro_glossary":[{"id":1,"identifier":"regdeep_nri_rekyc_mg_001","term_en":"Re-KYC: Re-KYC (Renewal of Know Your Customer) is the mandatory process where banks and financial institutions periodically update and verify your personal information","term_hi":"मौजूदा ग्राहक की KYC जानकारी का समय-समय पर अपडेट","term_hiLatn":"KYC ko regular interval par update karna, taaki customer ki details latest rahein."},{"id":2,"identifier":"regdeep_nri_rekyc_mg_002","term_en":"Re-KYC for NRIs for Non-Residential Indians (NRIs)","term_hi":"NRI ग्राहकों की पहचान और पते का नया सत्यापन","term_hiLatn":"NRI customers ka KYC dobara verify karna, jab woh India ke bahar ho."},{"id":3,"identifier":"regdeep_nri_rekyc_mg_003","term_en":"Digital Onboarding Digital onboarding is the streamlined, tech-driven process of integrating new customers, employees, or partners online -replacing paperwork.","term_hi":"पूरी तरह ऑनलाइन तरीके से ग्राहक को जोड़ना","term_hiLatn":"Customer ko app/website ke through bina branch aaye account kholna."},{"id":4,"identifier":"regdeep_nri_rekyc_mg_004","term_en":"Anti-Spoofing Anti-spoofing detects and blocks malicious actors disguising as trusted sources using IP checks, email analysis (SPF, DKIM), and biometric verification to ensure authenticity.","term_hi":"फर्जी GPS/IP/चेहरे को पहचानकर रोकने की तकनीक","term_hiLatn":"Fake location ya fake face ko detect karke block karne ka tech system."},{"id":5,"identifier":"regdeep_nri_rekyc_mg_005","term_en":"Geo-Tag Relaxation Ease mandatory geo-tagging for NRIs","term_hi":"NRI के Re-KYC के दौरान भारतीय GPS न होने पर दी गई ढील","term_hiLatn":"NRI ke Re-KYC mein India ka GPS mandatory nahi -country mismatch allowed."},{"id":6,"identifier":"regdeep_nri_rekyc_mg_006","term_en":"Liveness Check Liveness check verifies a person is real and live-not a photo, video, or deepfake -during digital identity verification.","term_hi":"यह जांच कि सामने व्यक्ति असली है, वीडियो/फोटो नहीं","term_hiLatn":"System check karta hai ki real aadmi camera ke saamne hai, photo/video nahi."}]}]}
